newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Colombo stock exchange closed for New Year holiday.
newsitem.headline: Colombo stock exchange closed for New Year holiday.

text.p: The Colombo Stock Exchange was closed on Tuesday for Sinhala and Tamil New Year holiday.
On Friday, the last trading day, the all share index closed 12.9 points higher at 665.9.

The index gained 24 points in four days of trading last week on improved market sentiment following an agreement between the Sri Lanka's two main political parties to work together to end the 13-year-old ethnic war.
